title: Srila Prabhupada Clarifies the Caste System | @madhupanditdasaofficial | ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HDG Srila Prabhupada

segments.text: Just take somebody who was saying, there was one video where Prabhupada says,
Shudra is fourth class. They carry out the orders of the others.
Somebody put it on the YouTube. Person cuts and pastes only that and puts.
And people are criticizing Prabhupada.
Oh, see, they have caste system.
Simply bringing sentimentalism over, Shudra means you are lower than Brahmana.
Especially, it has been rooted in western universities
to deprecate India's culture and say that there is a caste system
which is the biggest evil in the society.
Because the Varnashrama culture is a basis of spiritual life.
They want to break this.
So, therefore, they say, why is he, you are calling him Shudra, he is a Brahmana, he is a Kshatriya.
Why you differentiate like that in the society?
Even within an office, somebody is a manager.
Somebody is a deputy manager.
Somebody is a...
His salary is different.
His salary is different.
Why do you want to say, this is, oh, this is caste system.
So, we should be prepared to, you know, these are modern ideas
that are meant to attack the Daivya Varnashrama system.
The modern caste system of Brahmana, Kshatriya, Vaishya, Shudra, we also attack.
Our form of attack is to tell them what is real Brahmana,
what is Shudra within the society.
In terms of guna and karma.
We can say, okay, Westerners are talking like this.
You also have a king.
Then you had nobles.
Then you had knights.
And then you had next level ordinary people.
So, this is also your...
That means, historically, you had a caste system, no?
There is a king, there is a noble, there is a knight, there is this hierarchy.
Is there?
So, sentimentally, they bring up such things.
And such devotees who cut paste like this, they are doing great disservice to Prabhupada
because many are offending Prabhupada.
Whereas, what is Prabhupada?
Whereas, what is Prabhupada?
Prabhupada's vision, my God, he redefined what is Brahmana, Kshatriya, Vaishya, Shudra
to the entire world.
It is nothing to do with the caste system.
It is nothing to do with birth.
Today, in our ashram, how many of you know which caste you are from?
Nobody knows.
Some politician told, it is amazing that there is a group of people living together who do
not know what is their caste by birth.
Here, we do not know who is Brahmana, Kshatriya, Vaishya, who is SC, ST, no, nobody knows.
Because it does not matter to us.
Therefore, we are not curious to know.
If you are son of a high court judge, because of legal vibrations in the house, you have
got good chances of you also becoming a lawyer.
That does not mean that just because he is born, he will become a lawyer.
He has to train him.
And that is what Krishna consciousness movement is doing.
And when you become a Vaishnava, even karma you cross, you will be able to do work which
is not even your nature.
If that work is for Krishna, you will transcend even karma.
We do not care.
Your birth is Brahmana, Kshatriya, Vaishya, Shudra, we do not care.
Come surrender to Krishna and develop Vaishnava culture, Brahmanical culture.
